data.title: 2023 EE BAFTA Film Awards: The Winners
data.meta_description: Explore the winners and nominations for the 2023 EE BAFTA Film Awards, celebrating the very best in film of the past year. Scroll down to view the full list, or click images below to reveal category nominations. The EE BAFTA Film Awards, hosted by Richard E. Grant and Alison Hammond, took place on Sunday 19 February and were broadcast on BBC One & BBC iPlayer in the UK and around the world.
data.text:
